definition: thick end of the handle, to strike, thrust or shove against
details:
noun
- thick end of the handle
= synonyms: butt end
- the small unused part of something (especially the end of a cigarette that is left after smoking)
= synonyms: stub
- a large cask (especially one holding a volume equivalent to 2 hogsheads or 126 gallons)
- a joint made by fastening ends together without overlapping
= synonyms: butt joint
- finely ground tobacco wrapped in paper
= synonyms: cigaret, coffin nail, fag, cigarette
- sports equipment consisting of an object set up for a marksman or archer to aim at
= synonyms: target
- the fleshy part of the human body that you sit on
= example: the fleshy part of the human body that you sit on
= synonyms: tail
- a victim of ridicule or pranks
= synonyms: goat
- the part of a plant from which the roots spring or the part of a stalk or trunk nearest the roots
verb
- to strike, thrust or shove against
= example: to strike, thrust or shove against
= synonyms: bunt
- to lie adjacent to another or share a boundary
= example: to lie adjacent to another or share a boundary
= synonyms: march
- to place end to end without overlapping
= example: to place end to end without overlapping
